meaningMnemonic:
Your <kanji>sphere</kanji> <kanji>might</kanji> is the force you command over a sphere or ball… in this case, a baseball, making this <vocabulary>a pitcher’s stuff</vocabulary>. 

If you’re not familiar with this baseball term, we recommend giving it a google. In short, it refers to a pitcher’s pitches, judged by how inherently hard those pitches are to hit.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
